data.oai_dc:dc: A collection of Lepidoptera from Hastings. Approximately 130 specimens on cards collected by Quinton Tomich 1949-1951. Also approximately 1000 specimens on pins, primarily collected by Frank Sala 1991-1993 but including some taken from Tomich's 1949-1951 collection. See Hastings website for a variety of data sets on lepidoptera of Hastings, many collected by Jerry Powell. Jerry Powell corrected the 1940 names for the microlepidoptera.
